price: Má di ọwọ́ rẹ mọ́ ọrùn rẹ (má ya ahun), má sì tẹ́ ẹ sílẹ̀ tán pátápátá (má ya àpà), kí o má baà jókòó kalẹ̀ ní ẹni èébú (tí o bá jẹ́ ahun), ẹni tí kò níí sí lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀ mọ́ (tí o bá jẹ́ àpà).
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿal yadaka maghlūlatan ilā ʿunuqika walā tabsuṭ'hā kulla al-basṭi fataqʿuda malūman maḥsūran
